a.n: Bill Evans Trio: Louisiana Museum of

p.k: Bill Evans Trio: Louisiana Museum of Modern Art 1975. Bill Evans. Louisiana Museum of Modern Art, Humlebaek, Denmark
p.d: 30 minutes of... Bill Evans features a performance by one of the most revered pianists in music history. The performance highlights Evans' ever-deepening artistry as he performs with the stunning duo of bassist Eddie Gomez and drummer Eliot Zigmund. This recording includes Evans' renditions of the rarely performed 'Sareen Jurer,' 'Blue Serge' and 'Twelve Tone Tune Two.'
